trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_SEQ_00<tab>Everything Uin Nee does, they do for the children.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_TODO_00<tab>Search for relics near the House of the First Light.
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the drowned relic to Uin Nee.

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_000<tab>Answer me this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: when you were a child, what was your favorite dream you ever dreamed? Wait, you <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> a dreaming child once, yes? That's how it works, is it not?

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Anyhow, let me guess: you loved to dream of going on grand adventures. Journeying to the bottom of the deepest waters! Braving perilous ruins in search of ancient treasures! Why, that's what <var 1A 02 /var>I'd<var 1A 01 /var> like to dream of if I were a mortal child!

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Yes, I do believe that settles it: something precious from the ruins of the House of the First Light should be just what I need to spin the most stirring and dramatic dream ever! And <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> going to bring it to me─for the children, of course!

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_003<tab>What sort of relic will make the children happy? Well, how should I know? Only one of us has been a mortal child once, and it certainly isn't me! Anyhow, I'll leave it up to you. If I don't like what you bring me, I'll just send you back for more! Tee hee!
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_010<tab>Ooh! You're back! Wait...back from where, again? Oh, that's right! Tell me: what wondrous relic did you find for me under the waters?
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_011<tab>Why, it's a teensy-weensy figure of a knight. How very interesting!

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_012<tab>They say that in the old days of Voeburt, people used to play a game where they moved these bitsy people around a board. It doesn't sound nearly as fun as spinning dreams, but to each their own, I suppose.
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_013<tab>A silver ring...? It's so strangely cold to the touch. And these engravings...

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_014<tab>Ack! These runes are to ward away pixies! Whatever is the meaning of this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? Could it be that─gasp!─you don't like me as much as I like you?

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_015<tab>Why, it's an old Voeburtite coin! They say that back in the days of the Kingdom, you could buy all sorts of things with these. I haven't seen one of these in years...
TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_016<tab>Anyhow, I simply must polish it up to the finest sheen! Only the very best for my dreamers!

TEXT_BANPIX106_03694_UINNEE_000_017<tab>In any event, I do believe this will make for a most rousing treasure hunt for the children. If only you could be a child again, yes? I'd like nothing more than to spin you a dream as a token of my thanks!
